description:
The four Arayashiki leaders represent the Four Symbols of the Chinese constellation, corresponding to the four mythological creatures.
The creature of the North is Genbu (玄武), the Black Tortoise.
Genbu objects to twiddling her thumbs about http://anidb.net/ch40719 [Yoriko]`s situation. She agrees with http://anidb.net/ch40602 [Seiryuu]`s plan of using http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kyouta] as the control by a mindbreaker can only be broken by another mindbreaker. When http://anidb.net/ch40599 [Suzaku] considers this plan too dangerous, Genbu demands action or else she would break away from http://anidb.net/ch40598 [Arayashiki].
name: Arayashiki North
